name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Curtis BOSWELL, Appellant

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and PACKEL, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Curtis BOSWELL, Appellant.
attorneys: Howard B. Zavodnick, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
378 A.2d 855
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Curtis BOSWELL, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 11, 1976.
Decided Oct. 7, 1977.
Howard B. Zavodnick, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and PACKEL, JJ.
